name: It Stared Back
flavor_text: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Sword Guard has maximized efficiency and high endurance, but low resistance.
perks.name: Enduring Guard

perks.description: Rapid sword strikes increase this weapon's damage for a short duration. Guarding also ends the effect.
perks.name: Whirlwind Blade

perks.description: [Light Attack]  : Landing three light-attack hits within a short time grants Sword ammo.
perks.name: Relentless Strikes
